summary:
Senior IT Executive with over 10 years of progressive leadership experience overseeing enterprise technology strategy, governance, and operations across regulated and multi-site environments. Proven expertise in aligning IT infrastructure, cybersecurity, and enterprise systems with institutional objectives in high-compliance sectors.

Experienced in driving digital enablement, strengthening data governance frameworks, managing mission-critical infrastructure, and delivering secure, scalable platforms that support operational excellence and decision-making. Recognized for building resilient IT environments, optimizing budgets, leading cross-functional collaboration, and advising executive leadership on technology risk and innovation.
executiveScale: 10+ Years IT Leadership  ·  Enterprise Systems & ERP  ·  Regulatory Compliance  ·  Budget Oversight

technical: Microsoft Dynamics Business Central & ERP Oversight

achievements.text: Lead enterprise IT strategy, governance, and operational oversight across 15 business centers supporting over 1,000 users and multinational institutional clients.
Developed and executed enterprise IT roadmap aligned with organizational expansion and operational resilience objectives.
Established IT governance structures including policies, access control standards, data protection protocols, and operational risk frameworks.
Advised executive leadership on cybersecurity posture, technology risk, and infrastructure investment planning.
Implemented structured IT performance reporting to support leadership decision-making.
Oversaw enterprise platforms including Microsoft 365 ecosystem, collaboration systems, VoIP infrastructure, and financial system integrations.
Managed integration of secure access, identity governance, and endpoint protection systems across distributed locations.
Led cloud-first migration initiatives (Microsoft Azure), improving scalability, security, and operational continuity.
Supported enterprise financial operations using Microsoft Dynamics Business Central, ensuring system reliability, user access governance, and data integrity controls.
Implemented cybersecurity governance aligned with ISO 27001 best practices.
Designed disaster recovery and business continuity frameworks ensuring 99.9% system availability.
Conducted IT risk assessments and implemented mitigation controls reducing vulnerabilities by 30%.
Strengthened endpoint security and monitoring frameworks across all sites.
Managed multi-site IT budget and vendor contracts, achieving 20% cost optimization without compromising service quality.
Negotiated SLAs with technology providers, ensuring compliance and measurable service improvements.
Forecasted technology investment requirements aligned with growth strategy.
Built and mentored high-performing IT teams across distributed centers.
Established KPI frameworks and service standards, reducing incident resolution time by 40%.
Fostered a culture of accountability, continuous improvement, and structured IT service delivery.
Provided regional IT leadership across 500+ infrastructure deployments while overseeing compliance, vendor governance, and operational execution across multi-region projects.
Managed multi-million-shilling infrastructure budgets with strict cost control.
Negotiated vendor contracts with global OEMs (Huawei, Nokia, Cisco, Ericsson).
Standardized compliance frameworks (ISO, safety standards), improving project governance.
Led cross-functional technical teams ensuring consistent delivery and risk mitigation.
Contributed to ISO 27001-aligned ISMS initiatives.
Strengthened digital records governance (50,000+ records).
Supported regulatory compliance and structured ICT data management processes.
